item.title: FO - Newsletter - Subscribe to newsletter
item.description: FO - Newsletter - Subscribe to newsletter Details Component : Core Status : Automated Automated on : 8.0.x, 8.1.x, 9.0.x Scenario : https://forge.prestashop.com/browse/TEST-1496 Test : https://github.com/PrestaShop/PrestaShop/tree/develop/tests/UI/campaigns/functional/FO/classic/04_newsletter/01_subscribeNewsletter.ts Steps Step Description Expected result Go to the FO on the Homepage The FO homepage is displayed In the newsletter form field, add a email address who is not yet a newsletter subscriber email and click on “subscribe”
